{{cpp/title|common_type{{small|&lt;std::chrono::time_point&gt;}}}}
{{cpp/chrono/time_point/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++11|
template&lt; class Clock, class Duration1, class Duration2 &gt;
struct common_type&lt;std::chrono::time_point&lt;Clock, Duration1&gt;, 
                   std::chrono::time_point&lt;Clock, Duration2&gt;&gt;;
}}

Exposes the type named {{tt|type}}, which is the common type of two {{lc|std::chrono::time_point}}s.

===Member types===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc hitem|Member type|Definition}}
{{dsc|{{tt|type}}|{{c/core|std::chrono::time_point&lt;Clock, typename std::common_type&lt;Duration1, Duration2&gt;::type&gt;}}}}
{{dsc end}}

===Notes===
The common type of two {{lc|std::chrono::time_point}} types is a {{lc|std::chrono::time_point}} with the same clock as the two types and the {{lc|std::common_type}} of their durations.
